data.actual_result: No notification appears, but Discord still plays the notification sound
data.expected_result: The notification silently gets added to the Notification Center list without appearing on screen
data.short_description: Discord doesn't respect macOS DND mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Notification Center, scroll above the top of the notification list, and enable do not disturb mode - Do something that would cause Discord to send a notification
